text: "Yes; I said "Something happened all right. After you'd left the meeting, mister" I looked across at Nick Dowd "someone cut down William Appleton outside the Palace with a shotgun. I paused and watched my words affect them in their different ways. "That's sure bad news, said Dowd, sombrely. "It 2jest about leaves everything wide open for Mr. Pell and his bunch; observed Shorty.
